new multi-scale face detector.from sentence: In this paper , we propose a new multi-scale face detector with extremely tiny size ( EXTD ) resolving the two mentioned problems .

main discovery.from sentence: The main discovery is that we can share the network in generating each feature - map , as shown in .

sharing.from sentence: The sharing can significantly reduce the number of parameters , and this enables our model to use more layers to generate the low - level feature maps used for detecting small faces .

proposed iterative architecture.from sentence: Also , the proposed iterative architecture makes the network to observe the features from various scale of faces and from various layer locations , and hence offer abundant semantic information to the network , without adding additional parameters .

Our baseline framework.from sentence: Our baseline framework follows FPN - like structures , but can also be applied to SSD - like architecture .

design.from sentence: As in the figure , we design a backbone network such that reduces the size of the feature map by half , and we can get the other feature maps with recurrently passing the network .
